description: Try our easy to follow Teriyaki Salmon With Rice & Sesame Beans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Teriyaki Salmon With Rice & Sesame Beans
name: Teriyaki Salmon With Rice & Sesame Beans Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush skinless side of salmon with teriyaki sauce. Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add salmon, skin-side down, and reduce heat to medium. Cook for 3 minutes or until crisp. Turn, add remaining teriyaki sauce and cook for 1-2 minutes, basting occasionally with sauce. Serve salmon with steamed rice and sesame greens.
